value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Princess Fjorm, over here!$k$pLook! A bridal festival is held here
every year—and it looks like this
year's has started!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow! Everyone is dressed up like
brides! They are all so beautiful...$k$p$EFace|Wait... Is that...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Wedding19,Face|Ohh... If I don't hurry, the battle for
the bridal bouquet will start without
me!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-is that...ME?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Sure seems like it! It was hard to tell
with how fast she was running—but it
looked like you in a wedding dress!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Somehow, I'm shocked... I never
guessed I would ever see a...me from
another world!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It could also be a you from your
future, you know!$k$pWe summon Heroes from many
different worlds and many different
times, after all. So, it's possible.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Is that really...my future?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_花嫁フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Wedding19,Face|...So you each have someone, then...
someone you love and protect.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|Of course. I love Louise, my wife,
with all my heart—everything I am.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|While it's not the same as the love
of a married couple, I know what it's
like to be willing to sacrifice yourself.$k$pFor Empress Sanaki...I would offer up
my life, and more.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|Yes, that's right. For Louise, I...
I wouldn't mind losing everything
if it meant keeping her.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Wedding19,Face|Hm... I think I understand. I, too, have
someone I would do anything for...$k$p$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|Keeping someone close to your heart
is the path to true happiness. Tell me,
what is your special person's name?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Wedding19,Face|I-it's... U-umm...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|That's as much as we can do for
now. Let's find Louise and regroup.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Wedding19,Face|Of course. By the way...about my,
um...special person...$k$p$Sbs150|
